name: partner-portal
description: Server side app for the partner portal

scripts.test: cross-env CLIENT_ID="partner-portal" cross-env CLIENT_SECRET="partner-portal-test" nyc mocha --opts mocha.opts --watch
scripts.posttest: npm run remove-absolute-path-coverage && npm run clean
scripts.test:dev: cross-env CLIENT_ID="partner-portal" cross-env CLIENT_SECRET="partner-portal-test" mocha --opts mocha.opts --watch
scripts.test:dev:debug: cross-env CLIENT_ID="partner-portal" cross-env CLIENT_SECRET="partner-portal-test" node --inspect node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --require ts-node/register --watch --require source-map-support/register --require tsconfig-paths/register **/*.spec.ts --opts mocha.opts --watch
scripts.test:ci: cross-env CLIENT_ID="partner-portal" cross-env CLIENT_SECRET="partner-portal-test" multi='mocha-bamboo-reporter=- spec=-' nyc mocha --opts mocha.opts --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.posttest-ci: npm run remove-absolute-path-coverage && npm run clean
scripts.start:local: cross-env PROMETHEUS_USERNAME=none cross-env PROMETHEUS_PASSWORD=none cross-env LOCAL_TRANSLATIONS=true cross-env CLIENT_ID="partner-portal" cross-env CLIENT_SECRET="partner-portal-test" cross-env APP_VERSION=1.0.0 nodemon --config nodemon.json --inspect ./src/app.js
scripts.prets:build: npm run clean && npm run clean:release
